Difficulty Notes: Rule edge‑case: power usable while turned.
Question: Can the player straighten Guard Dog now even though it is turned?
Rationale: Guard Dog’s first power can be used while the card itself is turned.:contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}:contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}
